General.Name: GnBS Engineering Co. Ltd.
General.Description: GnBS Engineering Co.LTD. designs, produces, and sells products for preventing environmental pollution in South Korea. It offers cooling tower white smoke removal devices, harmful white smoke removal devices, and next-generation gas treatment devices without wastewater; powder forming and collecting devices; self-plasma optical emission spectrometers; and hazardous gas treatment devices, such as such as plasma dry, plasma, hybrid, thermal, burner, and dry and wet scrubbers. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Anseong, South Korea.
